Product Title: Lip Liner Set 12 Colors Natural Lip Liner Makeup Pencil Long Lasting Matte Velvet Lip Liner
Review Date: 2021/06/13
Store: Marine Forest
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Velvet', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Package Dimensions': '6.42 x 2.28 x 0.94 inches; 2.24 Ounces', 'UPC': '729843697955'}
Review Text: There aren't enough natural looking colors for this product to work well for me. The liners themselves are very bright colors and they also blend nicely. They also come off very easily.
Review Title: Doesn't look good

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user continues to exhibit a strong preference for personal care products that focus on skin health and comfort, highlighting a commitment to gentle exfoliation. Their recent interactions indicate a growing interest in makeup, particularly lip products; however, they maintain their emphasis on suitability for sensitive skin. Their latest purchase of a lip liner set reflects a desire for versatility in beauty, yet they express disappointment in the limited availability of natural color options and ease of removal.

Previous positive feedback indicates a preference for items that enhance the self-care experience, aligning with their holistic grooming philosophy. The user favors soft and effective cleansing tools, reinforcing their emphasis on comfort and functionality in their routine.

While exploring makeup, they prioritize products that promote a fresh and natural aesthetic without sacrificing usability. This trend suggests a continued pursuit of items that balance beauty with practicality. The user remains focused on soothing experiences in both skincare and makeup, valuing versatility, sensitivity, and ease of use, while ensuring that their selections enhance skin vitality and align with their overall self-care approach. Their current dissatisfaction with vibrant hues in lip products indicates a niche preference for more subdued, natural tones that complement their sensitive skin.
